heading: Easy to Use
description: User-friendly online way to send money in 3 simple steps.

heading: Faster Transfers
description: We know that speed is important when transferring money abroad. Simply select your beneficiary, enter the amount, and send. We zip your cash instantly, fast and in minutes.

heading: Lower Fees
description: Unbeatable low flat fees and foreign exchange rates across all countries are shown upfront.

heading: 100% Secure
description: With around the clock money monitoring, encryption and fraud protection, ZipRemit helps keep your money safe. Fully licensed and regulated by FINTRAC.

heading: 24/7 Customer Service
description: Awesome and friendly online chats with our Community Liaisons (CLs) anytime, anywhere and for anyone.

heading: Flexible Payments
description: Pay with Debit, Credit card, Email or your ZipWallet. Receive in hard cash, airtime, mobile money, bank deposit, food, data or ZipWallet.
